description:
**OVER 500 STUDENTS!**

UPDATED TO REFLECT GOOGLE CODING CHANGES.

Excellent tool for

  • Business Owners
  • Freelancers
  • Consultants
  • Non-Profits
  • Teachers
  • Real Estate Agents
  • Marketers

This course shows you how to create a Google Form and when the form is completed by a user will email you a PDF.

The course is about 40 minutes, so you could have your form online in about an hour, if you already have written your form.

Looking to improve Time Management or Organization? Online forms to emailed PDF might be the solution you're looking for... especially if your form needs to be seen by several people.

I have used online forms for Volunteers Forms, Certificates, Waivers, Training, Internship Applications, Contracts, and Surveys, however, it could be used for any use of a Google Form.

If you want to save time and keep those stacks of paper at bay, then buy this course to automate all those forms.

This course is presented by Lisa McTigue, Digital Lead, Market Style Media.
title: Convert Forms to Online Forms that Automatically Email a PDF
